metadata.name: Marzabad-Childhood dreams #1
metadata.description:
The physical version of this artwork  is also sold
My childhood dreams and life were always intertwined with nature, so that nature lived and grew with me in my art and thoughts.
In this series of artwork, I portrayed my childhood dreams. I have used the nature of my place of residence in creating the space.
This was a dream image I saw and painted after my grandmother's death. We believe that humans were created from dust and are buried in the ground after death.
Technique: watercolor and acrylic on cardboard
Physical size of artwork: 30 x 64 cm
Digital size of artwork: 5000 x 2347  pixels
